creator: Epicor Software Corporation
descriptionHtml:
Epicor Proof of Delivery Version 2.0 empowers drivers with the ability to view and map the entire route, confirm deliveries and capture signatures and images in the field. 

With seamless integration to Epicor Prophet 21 and Epicor Eclipse, Epicor Proof of Delivery will help to improve customer service, settle disputes more effectively and react to discrepancies all in a paperless real time environment. 

Use of this application may require additional functionality to be enabled on your Epicor® ERP solution at additional cost.

For Demo Data to be shown:
Server Name = demo
User Name = demo
Password = demo
descriptionShort: A paperless confirmation of delivery including images and signature capture.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Reduced size of images to optimize upload performance.
Fixed the email crashing issue.
Fixed an issue where quota was exceeded.

title: Epicor Proof of Delivery 2.0

creator: Epicor Software Corporation
descriptionHtml:
Epicor Proof of Delivery Version 2.0 empowers drivers with the ability to view and map the entire route, confirm deliveries and capture signatures and images in the field. 

With seamless integration to Epicor Prophet 21 and Epicor Eclipse, Epicor Proof of Delivery will help to improve customer service, settle disputes more effectively and react to discrepancies all in a paperless real time environment. 

Use of this application may require additional functionality to be enabled on your Epicor® ERP solution at additional cost.

For Demo Data to be shown:
Server Name = demo
User Name = demo
Password = demo
descriptionShort: A paperless confirmation of delivery including images and signature capture.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1) Mobile POD is randomly invoicing a day before delivered and signed date. Delivered date was not getting set correctly.
2) Removed the incremental counter for time spent on stop because we are no longer calculating the departure date from this. POD now sets the arrival date when the driver goes into the stop, and if completed the departure date time is set.
3) Invoices created thru mobile POD are being backdated.
